description: An Al Jazeera journalist and a freelancer were killed in an Israeli air strike in Rafah on Sunday.
maintext: Asked to comment on the allegations, Hamza al-Dahdouh's family told the BBC on Thursday: "It is clear that these are Israeli fabrications in an attempt to defend themselves and justify the targeting of Hamza and the journalists and divert the issue from its track to make it appear that it is not targeting journalists."
title: Gaza journalists’ families reject Israeli military's ‘terrorist’ claims
